96d5c046-fed8-4e43-8a33-152a3a50faf3:
When you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} on a foe, your target immediately becomes {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} has no effect on exhausted creatures.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess the Critical Mastery feat.
fc71d22c-7393-4bb3-8034-f99692ca1210:
When you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, you can apply the effects of two critical {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} in addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt.
Normal: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit in addition to the damage dealt.
7575e955-aa11-43a7-8a54-7600816554de:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} has no additional effect on a fatigued or {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} creature.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
85a4e216-6c84-42b1-8a0c-e98f4385dd1c:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} for 1 minute. The effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the effect's duration.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
21dfe307-f8cc-45e1-bbbb-d908162454a9:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, your opponent becomes {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces the duration to 1 round. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}. The effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} do not stack. Additional hits instead add to the duration.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
a4bd15af-c962-4715-9d05-698c128b42de:
Whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, your opponent is permanently {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} reduces this to dazzled for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} has no effect on creatures that do not rely on eyes for sight or creatures with more than two eyes. Blindness can be {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cured{/g} by {g|SpellsHeal}heal{/g}, regenerate, {g|SpellsRemoveBlindness}remove blindness{/g}, or similar abilities.
Special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
